text: Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg is a borough of Berlin. It is a new borough, only made in 2001 by joining the old boroughs of Friedrichshain and Kreuzberg. It occupies and has a population of about 255,200 as of 2003. Its current mayor is Franz Schulz (Green Party). == Other websites == * Official Homepage * Xhain.info - Private Portal (in German)
title: Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg
